papaya salad: I’ll have papaya salad with sticky rice. → phǒm ao sôm-dtam gàp khâaw-nǐaw khráp
fried vegetables: I’d like fried vegetables without chili. → chǎn khɔ̌ɔ phàt-phàk mâi sài phrík khà
mango: I want one mango. → chǎn ao má-mûaŋ 1 lûuk khà
grilled: I love grilled food. → phǒm chɔ̂ɔp aa-hǎan yâaŋ mâak
grilled (alt.): I love grilled food. → phǒm chɔ̂ɔp aa-hǎan yâaŋ mâak
